title: For Sale- T206 Joe Doyle, Tolstoi back.  Price reduction
author: nodgrass

posts.post_title: For Sale- T206 Joe Doyle, Tolstoi back.  Price reduction
posts.post_content:
For Sale- T206 Joe Doyle, hands over head, PSA 1 with Tolstoi back.

Final reduction on this one.

VERY difficult to find in this back.  In my opinion, the toughest of all Doyle backs by a slight margin over El Principe and Sovereign.  Only a couple have been graded by PSA and only a couple have been offered for sale in the past 5 or so years, this being one of them.   It’s not a gem but it presents well.  There is some paper loss on the reverse due to album removal. Reduced to $150+ insured shipping costs.  Please send questions/inquiries to my forum mailbox.

[IMG]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n88/MARCBOURGEA/T206_Doyle_Tolstoi_front-b-1.jpg[/IMG]
